website_summaries.verdict: No additional breathing tube is needed with this integrated dive mask that features a 180° panoramic view, foldable snorkel, and bonus carrying bag.
pros: Several colors available for both adults and children
While snorkel does fold, it can also be detached
Comes with a GoPro mount that's also detachable
Sturdy construction while still being comfortable on the face
cons: Can't dive too deep with snorkel attached
Is a bit bulky to pack when taking along on trips

customer_reviews.title: My 2yr old can snorkel now!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 2 years 4 months old and it fits great. The mask is perfectly designed to form to the child’s face. We live in Hawaii and although she can't swim yet, she can snorkel with her floaties or on a boogie board. She loves it. The price is unbeatable. I have and will continue to recommend this to everyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: Bradly

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for my 6 year old. His friends all want one now. :)
customer_reviews.author: Davin

customer_reviews.title: Great for our sensitive son
customer_reviews.text: Just returned from holiday. Purchased 2 for our kids. 7&6 yrs old. Our 6 yrs old son was uncomfortable with regular mask with a mouth piece and ended up not snorkeling last yr. I gave this mask a chance and....he couldn’t stop. Our daughter as well which was quite expected but for our son, tmask gets all the credits! Easy to breathe and both kids (totally not trained for snorkeling) could had stayed on the surface of water for a long time. So long that I got worried if they were ok lol. Strongly recommended to moms and dads who have a sensitive/very careful child.
customer_reviews.author: Oise oise

customer_reviews.title: The straps were comfortable, and I did not have to tighten them ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask after having returned one that leaked ferociously. This one was leak-free and the anti-fog coating worked well. The straps were comfortable, and I did not have to tighten them much to maintain a leak-free mask. I ordered small/medium size, my facial measurements being right on the dividing line between the next size, called "large."
customer_reviews.author: SDW

customer_reviews.title: Worked great with one issue
customer_reviews.text: I got thos for a trip to hawaqnd loved it. Felt a little silly initially and took some adjustment to breathing steadily but hot used to it after about 20 minutes. Didn't fog and adjusted to fit my face nicely. GoPro attachment was nice but preferred to hold camera in hand. One time I laughed and that caused face to shift and cover air vents. I had to lift face out of water and release pressure to get air. Because of that, would not recommend for new snorkelers or kids.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffo

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This worked! 7 year old and 4 year old kids used them to snorkel for first time while in Hawaii. It didn’t get a lot of use, so can’t speak to dogging or leakage over time. But water didn’t enter mask or tube when underwater briefly. Husband hates how they look. We did not use the GoPro attachment.
customer_reviews.author: sunnyk

customer_reviews.title: Great for exploring
customer_reviews.text: Love these masks. We have a couple now for my 4 yo and 6 yo daughters. They use them with ease and swim all over the place with them. Occasionally their hair will get in the seal and it will leak slightly, but we just adjust a bit and off they go again. Occasionally they fog up but we have some antifog and that clears it right up. We have had these in pools and the ocean. Love these and they go on all vacations with us.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Leak - Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I've snorkeled with a full head set like this and it was amazing. So much simpler than a traditional snorkel. The only trouble I had was when I dove under the water more than 5 feet - then water trickled in a bit around the gasket that sealed it to my face - not a lot, but after a few times I would push the bottom of the mask out to get rid of the small puddle. Otherwise the mask performed perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for learning how to snorkel.
customer_reviews.text: This was great for teaching my daughter how to snorkel. By the end of the cruise she was using a regular snorkle and mask and free diving but this definitely helped her get comfortable. There are risks with this mask of breathing in too much carbon dioxide if it doesn't fit right so I'm glad she doesn't need it any more. We never hooked our go pro up to it. It's not a simple assembly and we didn't want to have to take it on and off all the time so we just used a handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: Babies learned to swim underwater!
customer_reviews.text: I have 7 grandchildren ages 3- 19 They love the masks. I got so tired of them fighting over goggles or having to constantly tighten or loosen the ones we had. Their play time ( and mine ) was interrupted all the time. So I read the reviews and decided to order them all a mask. So glad I did!! Both 3 year olds and a 5 year old learned to swim with them and no water leakage. I was totally not expecting them to learn to swim but it gave me the confidence to go under and away they went. Best investment I have ever made !
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Dumbo's Feather
customer_reviews.text: This boy cannot swim. He's 7 and is wearing a blue kids size small mask by QingSong. He likes the water but was afraid to learn to swim and stayed by the stairs and edge. After he received this, he relaxed enough to just "swim" around. He's basically snorkeling. This mask is a Dumbo Feather. Now he's all over the shallow end with or without it and will swim all around the deep end. It's like training wheels for swimming. I'm happy with the quality, build and fit of this mask, so much, I bought a second one for my nephew. When he out grows this one, I'LL BE BACK.
customer_reviews.author: So Cal Dad

customer_reviews.title: Works good, will scratch easy
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son was so excited to get this he had to try it out in the tub since our pool isn't open yet. So he got on his suit and went for a dive. It works great. It took him a little while to get used to and if water gets in it, it does take alot of shaking to get it out. He bumped his nose on the bottom of the tub and it did scratch off the coloring of the mask. So be sure to keep it in a safe place as I think this will scratch easily.
customer_reviews.author: Nahoo

customer_reviews.title: Great item for any level of diver!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a Father’s Day gift. My father is an avid swimmer and cleans pools for a living. He uses his mask while working and for recreation. He loves this mask to say the very least. It fits well and the bonus items were appreciated. The float stop is awesome for an inexperienced snorkeler. If you dive a bit too deep, it automatically stops water from entering the snorkel. This product was favored so strongly that I purchased a second for another family member. I would recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Dupuis

customer_reviews.title: Defective.
customer_reviews.text: This mask leaks bad. As soon as you submerge the mouthpiece floods. I am VERY experienced in snorkeling and diving and know how to troubleshoot snorkel great. It’s also tough to get a good deal on these, and to keep the good seal. Wouldn’t recommend to anyone I liked... maybe to my worst enemy though... Would return but I’m outside of my window by like 4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for an upcoming beach trip for my daughter (3 years old). We let her try it out in the pool first and it works perfectly. She has not gone completely under water yet, but this is such a better alternative for her over the regular snorkels that go in the mouth. She seems much more comfortable with this versus a snorkel mask, and I don't fear her sucking in water by accident.
customer_reviews.author: TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Good practice snorkel for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My six year old has been preparing for an upcoming trip by swimming with with this several times in a pool and so far she loves it! The fit is great, comfortable, somewhat easy to get on and no leaks. The one thing about this product that is a slight safety concern to me is that she can scream at the top of her lungs and it’s almost impossible to hear her, unless you are within 2 feet or less.
customer_reviews.author: MEGAN

customer_reviews.title: Leaked Within 2 Minutes, THUMBS DOWN!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this mask. My son used it the first time and within the first two minutes, there was water coming through the filters and filling up the mask. Very unhappy that my 9 year was so disappointed all due to this cheap product that did not work the way it was advertised. The product would not seal correctly around his face either. Beware of sponsored and discounted items, there is a reason.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, when I look at the overall build quality, I feel like it leaves a bit to be desired at this price point. If it was $10 cheaper I think I'd give it 5 stars. The mask itself works as intended. It's a nice way to introduce my kid to snorkeling without needing to learn to mess with a separate snorkel/mask combo. It also comes in cool colors. Overall, it was still worth it since my kids likes it so much but I probably wouldn't buy one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a birthday gift for my great-nephew, who just turned 7. He is the size of an average 7 year, maybe a little on the thin side, but he said he loves it. I made sure he let me know how it worked after he tried it out because I wanted to make sure it would seal/fit. His only complaint is his hair keeps going over his eyes, but as I told him, that is from his haircut, not the snorkel :)
customer_reviews.author: C. Lewski

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable, not ease to breathe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these, one large and a smaller one. The side of the smaller one cracked after just a couple of uses and now isn’t usable. The other one hasn’t cracked yet but the valves make it hard to breathe. (This was also an issue on the smaller one before it broke.) Previous to these, we had a more expensive snorkel mask but misplaced the snorkel tube after pulling it off for storage. I purchased these because they were cheap and we loved our first mask. I would suggest buying a higher quality mask, even if that means paying more.
customer_reviews.author: Nicksname

customer_reviews.title: Best present for your child
customer_reviews.text: The best present for my 4 years old, he can put it on and take it off by himself. My son likes to use it in a swimming pool and learned how to swim under water. I am sure he will have more fun in the ocean, haven’t tried it there yet. I would definitely buy it again, highly recommend for snorkeling. The glass was getting foggy once in a while, so I use shaving cream, left it on and let it dry completely, then wipe it off. It seems to help. No leaks, fit comfortably on my 4 years old and have some room for bigger face.
customer_reviews.author: xjsade

customer_reviews.title: The quality is very good and the material is very thick plastic
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very good and the material is very thick plastic, there is a separate storage bag with it, also sent a waterproof phone bag for free
customer_reviews.author: Lingkai

customer_reviews.title: Genius design for little kids first snorkle!
customer_reviews.text: When our 4 year old was asking for a snorkle I was hesitant and not sure he'd be able to handle the mouth piece and not breathing through his nose at his age. When we found this we knew it was perfect! Gave our little guy a lot of confidence in the pool and he loved being able to see everything going on under water. He wore it for a long time comfortably without any leaking.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 4 year old and fits me too
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love to snorkel and we have a 4 year old son. We are going to Miami in a month and just got the snorkel mask for my son. We tested it out this weekend in Corpus and it worked like a champ and easy for my son to use. I did have to stay with him constantly because he is 4 and remind him to keep his head at certain angle so he could breath while under water. But it took about 2 minutes of coaching then he had it down. I would recommend this to anyone that has young children and want them to be able to enjoy a whole new world with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t clear nose/ears. Surface snorkeling only
customer_reviews.text: If your child likes to do a little diving, 3-6 feet under water, don’t use these masks. You are unable to clear your nose/ears with the full face cover. My daughter loves to try and swim with the fish and it causes her to get a terrible headache or have to surface, take her mask off and clear her nose. Great for surface ONLY snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Berlin

customer_reviews.title: 6 yr old petite daughter
customer_reviews.text: my 6 yr old got to snorkel in the FL keys thanks to this. She loves it and feels as though she can be a mermaid with it on. Tried another brand and this one works better.
customer_reviews.author: HorseJumper

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but maybe not best option for adults
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to Hawaii so I wouldn't have to rent gear. I would recommend it for a child because of the full face design, but it wasn't as clear as I hoped and it tended to come loose in any kind of surf or larger wave. For an adult, I think a regular face mask and snorkel are a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Goalois

customer_reviews.title: Great masks for kids who want to go under water
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent my kids love them. You can go underwater and nothing goes in!! No putting your mouth on anything neither you just breathe normally
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fit - Straps are not kid friendly
customer_reviews.text: This is hard to put on due to the design of the straps. It should have been made with a strapping mechanism that can lock/unlock. Because of the design of the strap one has to push the mask down in order to put it on causing the rubber that seals water out to be misplaced. Sorry if I don't make it completely clear, but the bottom line is that is not very friendly for kids to put on...
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre Costa

customer_reviews.title: Grandson likes it
customer_reviews.text: While I think it is kind of weird, my 5yo grandson took to this almost instantly and swims confidently across the pool with it. Whatever works, I guess. I wondered about the safety and the chance of getting a mouthful of water but it does not seem to happen. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Nami

customer_reviews.title: Odd fit
customer_reviews.text: It’s a kids mask, my son likes it but immediately notice the difference between this company and the Walmart bought Hydro swim mask. It sits oddly on his head oddly. He complained that it’s pulling on his hair unlike the Hydro Walmart bought one. Same price btw.
customer_reviews.author: Quist6

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely amazing! I have a 2, 4, and 6 yr old and they fit perfectly on all of them. The mask come with adjustable straps. The kiddos were able to fully submerge themselves in the water without getting any water in their masks. They also do not fog up which is a plus. I would 100% recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle A.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for kids 5+
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Kids breadth normally. Hardly any water went inside. We got the small Size (age 5-9y Really depends on the head circumference ). Orange was a great color for both boy or girl.Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked good until the snorkel came off
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty neat but the snorkel came off too easily in the waves, eventually the snorkel came off one too many times and we couldn’t find it, and then it was useless without the snorkel. I’d love to order a replacement snorkel but have not been able to find one to order. Wish it was made to have the snorkel fit tighter on the mask.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed it, but after a few times it needs ...
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed it, but after a few times it needs to be tighten more frequently to get the seal. Sometimes gets to tight. But is a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: wingrider97

customer_reviews.title: Clear view, comfortable mask
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for swimming because her other goggles would leak water into them and get foggy. This mask doesn’t fog over and doesn’t leak. It’s the perfect fit without hurting. My 7 year old daughter has no trouble getting the mask on by herself. She loves being able to see her diving rings in the pool now.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Haiar

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids to learn how to snorkel
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old was very skeptical of this but decided to give it a try. After the first time using it she hardly ever took it off in the pool. She could swim the whole length of the pool and not come up.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Kids LOVE this facemask style
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this full facemask style. You can really see how well they swim when they don't have to worry about breathing techniques at the same time. They use it in the pool everytime. Easy fit and adjustable and great seal around their faces.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Pearson

customer_reviews.title: The boys enjoy them and get more fun out if the fool.
customer_reviews.text: We only use them in a small above ground pool. But my 5 year old grand kids were having trouble with regular goggles and wanted no go under water. The mouth snorkel didn’t work very well for them so we decided to try this full mask. They put them on & off by themselves and they loved them. we don’t use the camera feature since it’s used in a little pool.
customer_reviews.author: Bertha

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for your little swimmer!!!
customer_reviews.text: On a recent trip to Gulf Shores, we saw several kids with these on their heads. Being really curious, I stopped a child to inquire about them and found out that they are very colorful and well-designed snorkel masks. My 7 year old grandson is an avid swimmer, so I ordered him one when we got home. He loves it and uses it every time he swims in our pool. I would highly recommend this fun water toy.
customer_reviews.author: arcdebra

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has used this a ton! We live on an island and go snorkeling several hours a week. It gives her confidence that she couldn’t get with regular snorkeling gear because she felt like she couldn’t breath. I have had no issues with it except when my daughter put it down in the sand... don’t do that. Takes time to clean in out and it’s a pain! Overall I love it and would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tamie Aragon

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought my 8 &9 year old sons this mask to make it easier for them to snorkle with the family. Masks did not fit either of my son's faces. Water would get into both masks so it wasn't a fluke faulty seal. I followed the recommendation and measured their faces, the description also shows this size fits ages 4-11. I do not recommend buying this type of mask online since it can't be tried on and fitted properly.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: GRANDSON LOVED IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: purchased this for our beach trip for my grandson. It was great. He loved it and was under water more than on top. I wish I had a purchased more. Could of definitely sold a lot by the pool to other parents.
customer_reviews.author: JStanley

customer_reviews.title: they have a good fit and I like the fact you don't have ...
customer_reviews.text: We will be taking this to the Bahamas, they have a good fit and I like the fact you don't have a snorkel in your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Rangeric

customer_reviews.title: Fun but not practical
customer_reviews.text: Out little one didn’t enjoy it, it looks great, sturdy but it was not as useful and beneficial as we expected. I am sure others may find it useful but unfortunately we didn’t. We kept it to see if other kids find it useful
customer_reviews.author: Health Reader

customer_reviews.title: Much needed.
customer_reviews.text: Just what my 5 year old needed! She loves playing in our pool, but is not comfortable jumping in yet. She is getting better at it because the water stays off of her face with this!
customer_reviews.author: Erica123

customer_reviews.title: 10 stars!!
customer_reviews.text: 10 stars! I bought this for my 6 year old! It has given him the confidence to learn to swim! He is able to jump in the pool and off the diving board without the mask slipping. He says it is so comfortable! He has even worn it in the lake! He used the mask to learn how to float on his back and his belly. He then wanted to remove his mask and swim without it! He did great! He's had so much fun with this mask!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Lathan

customer_reviews.title: Changed my son's life!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son who is on the Spectrum, will get in the water with this mask. He has sensory issues with water on his face and this mask changed his life...
customer_reviews.author: Brandy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product..it's like when you bought your first color TV.
customer_reviews.text: I started snorkeling in 1950. I bought this mask for my grandson.he is 5. Also bought a pair of swim fins. He learned how to swim in one afternoon. Fins help you keep your legs up .mask makes breathing a non issue. After 15 minutes I couldn't keep up with him.
customer_reviews.author: robert s perkel

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING!
customer_reviews.text: A great snorkel mask! My grands love theirs! But do not be misled by the ad's claims....you CANNOT BREATHE UNDERWATER with this type of mask!!!!! It's only for surface swimming.
customer_reviews.author: scmummy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son has only used it in the bathtub so far but it works perfect and he loves it. Much better than traditional mask. All built in together. I wish the snorkel was a little longer. He was love using it in the pool this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Good mask but bad snorkel latch design
customer_reviews.text: Fix my childs head comfortably but the single latch connecting the snorkel to the mask easily disconnects
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Better than a traditional snorkel
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love this. Way better than a traditional snorkel. When you go under water, the tube closes and does not let water in.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping=Addiction

customer_reviews.title: Nice entry mask
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely designed with a carry bag that is drip dry/sand bag. Wish the snorkel would pivot and near against mask vs have to come off. Worry about it holding up for long or if I let/my son removes it himself.
customer_reviews.author: LivedThere

customer_reviews.title: Good for snorkeling or learning to swim
customer_reviews.text: I wish they had these when I was younger. This worked great to get my son used to the water. Eventually helped him learn to swim since he didn't have to worry about getting water in his eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Blessings

customer_reviews.title: Loved by water baby
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter loves this. She can go underwater and explore without having to come up to breath. Breathing seems more natural then having a snorkel in your mouth. Great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Murse Man

customer_reviews.title: SATISFIED 🙌🏼🙌🏼
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these at a time for my 6 year old daughter and my 4 year old nephew (just to make sure it was up to par for the kids). It fits their faces so perfect. Just make sure you adjust the straps in the back to properly fit each child’s head. Other than that, this mask can fit any small child.
customer_reviews.author: Pretty Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great kids snorkel mask.
customer_reviews.text: Great snorkel mask for a kid. Also a great COVID 19 mask for airplane trip. Worked like a charm. Combined the advantages of a face shield and a mask and easier to wear.
customer_reviews.author: henry temple

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Training my four year old son to snorkel. Worked like a charm. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. He took it to a friend’s house and their mom immediately got online to purchase one for her kiddos. He loves it! He hasn’t had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa V.

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved this for swimming in the lake. Great for little kids that can’t use a real snorkel yet
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: this was a hit with my 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: and I was amazed at how air tight it was - there was never a drop in the mask, even after submersing the snorkel. Brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: cpseattle

customer_reviews.title: Keeps water out!
customer_reviews.text: We took this to a local beach to test it out today. It worked as described! It is an extra small but I could wear it, a bit snug. Great mask!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love to swim but an horrible at turning my head the right or left and breathe. So, I get frustrated. Terrible swimmer. This mask lets me. swim and breathe easily. No fogging. No water in your mask. Just great.
customer_reviews.author: Occasional Buyer

customer_reviews.title: So great
customer_reviews.text: Grandson LOVES it. Very cool look and easy to use and adjust too bad our Summer is seasonal he has to wait till next year to reuse... or bathtub!?
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids
customer_reviews.text: This device is perfect for children so that they only have to manage 1 device instead of a mask and snorkel separately. Our kids have been swimming in them all summer long and it's super easy for them to put it on and take it off themselves and we haven't had any complaints of anything leaking. I would definitely recommend it. We bought one for the entire family.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. A bit small for my kid of 8 years old. But fit perfectly for my 6 years old boy
customer_reviews.author: laure93320

customer_reviews.title: Great mask for small child
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 3 1/2 year old granddaughter. She loves it! It fit well and didn’t let in any water. She was swimming all over the pool with her face in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Temple Naff

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 4.5 year old has been having a blast with this! Works great, easy for her to put on and no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Ontario

customer_reviews.title: Amazing snorkel at a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this mask, the elastic is very soft and wide for comfort. Easy to put on and adjust, even with a head full of hair. Snorkel works well, will definitely be buying another for my other daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Kylene

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It’s great no water leaks in. Great product recommend you buy also. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: para Gavalas

customer_reviews.title: Never fogs
customer_reviews.text: This stupid thing out performs my adult sized one thats way more expensive. Never fogs, crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put on but easy breathing.
customer_reviews.text: Find a mask that is easier to buckle or put on. Very difficult to put on kids and get hair out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this mask! So easy to use, especially for younger kids who may have trouble with a regular snorkel
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and stores nicely
customer_reviews.text: sealed great around my face. I do like how the top snorkel stays attached and just folds down when ready to store in the neat netted bag!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Use while in Florida on vacation. They worked great. No complaints on quality at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter used the snorkel during a snorkeling trip to Crystal River and she did great. It fogged up a little but I think it was because she kept talking to us.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Child's mask
customer_reviews.text: Just received. Looks like will just fit our 4 yr granddaughter. Quality looks above average. Can't rate without using first
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our 4 (almost 5 year old son). It fits him great. My husband even got a few minutes use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Review 175

customer_reviews.title: I practiced at a near by pool first.
customer_reviews.text: I loved how clear the bottom of the pool was in the mask. I actually went to a recreation center to try it out before our big trip. I saw an any in the pool. That was very usual, I lost and earring and I found it. I even found the back of my earring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. It’s for my 7 year old who is very small (size of a 4 year old) and fits great. My adult face could even for into it albeit a tad small but enough for me to try it out and immediately realize I want one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves his mask it got pretty beat up on our trip to Mexico using it in the pool. But my son loves it and it works pretty well and keeps water from getting in.
customer_reviews.author: sebastian ramirez

customer_reviews.title: works great! used it in Hawaii with no issues
customer_reviews.text: works great! used it in Hawaii with no issues. The shop at the reef was charging $50 to rent these same masks.
customer_reviews.author: zoroloco

customer_reviews.title: Great for newbies
customer_reviews.text: We had 5 to 13 year olds using this mask and they all loved it. Being newbies at snorkeling they all liked having no water in their face and no mouth piece. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Echols

customer_reviews.title: Great snorkel
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my 5 year old. It was her first time snorkeling and we had no issues with her figuring it out right off the bat. Super easy to use and way better than the other version of snorkels. She used it all day with no issues
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: The mask does place a bit of pressure on your face.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son and daughter. They both said it worked great. My son was absolutely not going to wear the classic mask and snorkel however he had no problem using this mask snorkel combination.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Is bought for my son but I use all the time I love it, you can relax and breathe under the water. Very good for learn to swim
customer_reviews.author: Galo Serrano Abad

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he wore it for 2 whole mins. Difficult to breathe, you are better off buying the regular goggles with snorkeler.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool Idea!
customer_reviews.text: This item is just as you see. you can breath without having a snorkel in your mouth. My husband is excited to see how they work out when we go on vacay! very good quality, I think I will order another one so we don't have to share.
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Loed it
customer_reviews.text: Great price and works great! Better than my goggles and tube. Will never go back. Minimal fogging.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Thornburg

customer_reviews.title: Children loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Used it everywhere! The lake, pool and even the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford

customer_reviews.title: My 8yo loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yo loves it. It did take awhile to get used to the idea that you can take a breathe under water but now he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great for our new swimmer!
customer_reviews.text: Our son was having trouble with learning to swim, he didn't like the water in his eyes and nose. This worked perfectly. Made a huge difference with his swim lessons.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: WATER LEAKS!
customer_reviews.text: This mask leaked after a week or so, the mouthpiece flooded. We thought it wasn't thigh enough (it was a gift for little nice), but then we realized the product was just defective. I'm out of the return window, so bad news for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Coronado

customer_reviews.title: So much better than your traditional  snorkel masks!!
customer_reviews.text: I was always skeptical about these type of mask but my daughter fell in love and feels more comfortable going under water with this type of mask! And the quality of this brand is amazing!! Great buy!! Getting more for my nieces!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas present upon request. The kids really seemed to like them and they will be used when they take snorkeling lessons this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Best snorkel we have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect snorkel for kids. It’s easy to breathe and the size of the mask gives full visual range. We bought it for our 4 year old and it fits perfectly - we wanted to see how it worked so the adults tried it on and used it in the pool - and we can see why our son never takes it off while swimming. It’s very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, go under and stops inlet of water and come up and continue to breathe again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Fits both my 6 & 8 year olds. They love this mask. Need to buy another. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Fountain

customer_reviews.title: New world of snorkeling!
customer_reviews.text: This product gave my family a new view into snorkeling! The view under water is very clear, it doesn't fog and you can breath with ease. The only catch is that you need to move it around your face to get the perfect seal.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo R.

product_meta.title: QingSong Full Face Snorkel Mask Kids, Snorkeling Mask with Detachable Camera Mount, 180 Panoramic Upgraded Dive Mask with Newest Breathing System, Dry Top Set Anti-Fog Anti-Leak
feature_bullets: FULL FACE SNORKEL MASK: be different from other traditional snorkel goggles mask, our snorkeling mask provides you a 180 degree field of vision, and offers superior views over a standard diving mask and opens up a new world of underwater adventure, full face design allows you to breath comfortably through nose and mouth during snorkeling

ANTI-FOG AND ANTI-LEAK: separate inhaling and exhaling channels stop the top snorkel mask from fogging up, and anti-fog coating on the lens and anti-fog inserts guarantees anti-fog effect; advanced leak-proof silicone sealing mask with floating ball prevents salty water from entering in mask

COMFORTABLE TO WEAR: be made of hard PC, snorkel mask adult anti fog is non-toxic and odourless; wrapped by soft and thick silicone, it protects your safety and won’t make you headache for longtime wearing; free breath and no need to hold a breathing tube in your mouth and clinch your jaw the entire time, 9.3 inches long snorkel tube allows you to diving deeper and deeper

FRIENDLY GIFT TO BEGINNERS: full face snorkeling mask is easier to use than traditional diving mask and more friendly to beginners and youth, the camera mount enables you to install Gopro and records the dreamlike underwater world, it’s a perfect present to family and friends; use this sports snorkel mask and enjoy unforgettable vacation

AFTER SALES SERVICE: As long as you are our customers, since the day you buy QingSong snorkel mask. We will provide 24-hour uninterrupted service. We sincerelly believe we will bring the customers the most satisfied buying experience.
